import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Accordion, Card, Button, Form, Col, Row, Table, } from "react-bootstrap"; import useForm from "../utills/useForm"; import validate from "../utills/validateInfo"; import { getIngredients, getUnits, getDiets, getCategories } from "../DAL/api"; function NewRecipeForm(props) { const [ingredients, setIngredients] = useState([]); const [units, setUnits] = useState([]); const [instructions, setInstructions] = useState([]); const [guide, setGuide] = useState([]); const [diets, setDiets] = useState([]); const [categories, setCategories] = useState([]); const { handleSubmit, handleChange, values, errors } = useForm( submit, validate ); const deleteInstruction = (index) => { instructions.splice(index, 1); setInstructions([...instructions]); }; const deleteGuide = (index) => { guide.splice(index, 1); setGuide([...guide]); }; function submit(e) { props.addUser(values); } useEffect(async () => { const fetchIngredients = await getIngredients(); const fetchUnits = await getUnits(); const fetchDiets = await getDiets(); const fetchCategories = await getCategories(); setUnits(fetchUnits); setIngredients(fetchIngredients); setDiets(fetchDiets); setCategories(fetchCategories); }, []); return (

); } export default NewRecipeForm;
